metadata.name: #1 Now or Never
metadata.description:
The crowd was tough, the rules.. There were death marches playing in my head all the time. Had I given up or had I taken a step towards a start? Maybe past experiences, future anxiety prevented my freedom.

Maybe I was lonely, but my wings appeared. I knew I was going to fly, I made my way into the unknown of the sky..

Artist: Erman Gulbag

Title: Now or Never

Collection: Dusty Hopes

Year: 2022

Edition: 1/1

About the Artist: Erman Gulbag is an artist from Istanbul, who graduated from the University of Visual Communication Design and completed his Master's degree in Advertising and Strategic Brand communication.

License: Can be used to display privately, or in commercial and non-commercial settings, or in groups with an unlimited number of participants. The license includes unlimited use and display in virtual or physical galleries, documentaries, and essays by the NFT holder. Provides no rights to create commercial merchandise, commercial distribution, or derivative works.
